message.entry: Invalid sample time. Sample time must be a real scalar value or an array of two real values.
Invalid sample time. Period must be -1 or greater than or equal to 0.
Invalid sample time. Offset must be smaller than period.
Invalid sample time. When period is -1, offset must be 0.
Invalid sample time. When period is 0, offset must be 1.
Invalid sample time. When period is Inf, offset must be 0.
